IRPact_modellierung.distributions

Class BoundedUnivariateDistribution

  • java.lang.Object
    • IRPact_modellierung.distributions.Distribution
      • IRPact_modellierung.distributions.UnivariateDistribution
        • IRPact_modellierung.distributions.BoundedUnivariateDistribution
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FiniteMassPointsDiscreteDistribution

    public abstract class BoundedUnivariateDistribution
extends UnivariateDistribution
    Abstraction to model a univariate distribution that has a lower and an upper bound. The implementation of the bounded univariate distribution is used to generate values; However this abstraction checks that the values are within the specified bounds, and will otherwise generate values until this is achieved. Thus the modeler has to be careful that legal values can be derived from the distribution in a reasonable amount of time (meaning that a reasonable amount of mass of the distribution should be concentrated within the [lowerBounds, upperBounds]

    • Constructor Detail

      • BoundedUnivariateDistribution

        public BoundedUnivariateDistribution(java.lang.String name,
                                     double lowerBound,
                                     double upperBound)
                              throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Generates a univariate distribution generating values within the interval [lowerBound, upperBound]
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the distribution
        lowerBound - The lower bound for the distribution (guarantees that derived values will be >= lowerBound)
        upperBound - The upper bound for the distribution (guarantees that derived values will be <= upperBound)
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Will be thrown when lowerBound > upperBound

    • Method Detail

      • draw

        public double draw()
        Draws a value from the underlying distribution. Will keep drawing values until it is provided with a legal value (that lies in [lowerBound, upperBound]).
        Specified by:
        draw in class UnivariateDistribution
        Returns:
        Legal value of the distribution (within [lowerBound, upperBound]).

      • drawValue

        public abstract double drawValue()
        Method that generates the values from the underlying distributions for the draw-method. Will be called to derive values of instances
        Returns:
        A value provided by the underlying distribution

        public double getLowerBound()
